name: High Dreams
description:
How to play:

Gertrudis wanna go her family planet along the galaxy, help her making tap to increase the speed, but Watch out!!, if you tap too much or get hit by a obstacle, you're out!!.

        

TEAM

Programming - Aitor Portillo

Game Designer & Sound - Ivan Cano

2D artist, Concept artist & Animator- Felipe Cabezon

2D artist & Concept Artist - Lara Veiga

Remember: Its a .APK, so download it in your phone to play it!!
